TheVixenMod:BurnKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Burned creatures take more damage from all attacks equal to the amount of #rBurn on them. NL When the stack of #rBurn passes a multiple of 4, apply 1 #bWeak. NL #rBurn is removed at the end of turn.

TheVixenMod:SunnyDayKeyword.DESCRIPTION: 1 stack of this power is used up to trigger a card's #rSunny effect.

TheVixenMod:SunnyKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Requires the power #rSunny #rDay to trigger. NL Consumes 1 stack of it upon doing so.

TheVixenMod:SunnyExhaustKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Requires the power #rSunny #rDay to trigger. NL Consumes 1 stack of it and #rExhausts upon doing so.

TheVixenMod:SubstituteKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Prevents damage similar to #bBlock, but is not removed at the end of turn. NL The blow that removes this deals 0 damage.

TheVixenMod:ProtectspamKeyword.DESCRIPTION: #bProtect is less effective. NL Reduced by 1 each turn except the turn it was applied.

TheVixenMod:DebuffKeyword.DESCRIPTION: This means all powers on you that are debuffs, as well as unique #rCurse- and #bStatus cards in your hand.

TheVixenMod:CumulativeDurationKeyword.DESCRIPTION: The stacks of all #rdebuff powers on you combined, added to the amount of #rCurse- and #bStatus cards in your hand.

TheVixenMod:CopycatKeyword.DESCRIPTION: This card exhausts. NL #rSunny: Shuffle a copy of the repeated card into your discard pile.

TheVixenMod:PsycrackerKeyword.DESCRIPTION: 2 Cost Attack, Purge NL When drawn, draw a card. NL Deal 4 basedamage to a random enemy 8 (12) times. NL Lose #ySynergy #yBurst's effects.

TheVixenMod:TrickRoomKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Power only deteriotates at the end of turn if you were #rattacked while #rVulnerable during said turn. NL Stacks with #bodd #bmushroom.

TheVixenMod:NotSunnyKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Requires the power #rSunny #rDay to NOT trigger. NL Consumes 1 stack of it upon doing so.

TheVixenMod:MysticalFireKeyword.DESCRIPTION: You gain the #rSunny #rDay regardless of the #rNot #rSunny effect.

TheVixenMod:RightmostKeyword.DESCRIPTION: If there are not enough cards to #rretain, #bdraw #bcards #bnext #bturn equal to the amount of missing cards.

TheVixenMod:MoodyNonSense1.DESCRIPTION: Option only available if appropriate cards are in hand.

TheVixenMod:MoodyNonSense2.DESCRIPTION: This will happen regardless of the starting effects.

TheVixenMod:MoodyNonSense3.DESCRIPTION: You can consider this card the "Form" for self-debuffing.
